entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers early this evening. 40 percent chance of flurries before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PDT Wednesday 12 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of wet flurries or rain showers. High plus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: A few flurries ending late in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of wet flurries or rain showers. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 6 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PDT Wednesday 12 April 2023
